attributes.title: ❤️TicTok❤️
attributes.review: I was so excited to get this app and support our.   🤮lovely🤮 president but I was unpleasantly surprised. This app is horrible. It is laggy stupid and I hate it. Why would anyone want it. If you are thinking about downloading don’t. It will make you very mad and hate everything. Don’t support this app and help gen z with the tic tok resolution.

attributes.title: Tiktok
attributes.review: Why dose tiktok have to be banned and ........ this app is so stupid and not useuble so we need to deleted this appp and keeppp .......... tiktok pleassssse we need tiktok more then this app because this is unusable and tiktok is funny interning and teaching people how to dance and I will say something about tiktok ........ it teaches my sister how to dance befor tiktok she was bad at daceung and now that she has it she so good at danceing

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: First off I opened the app to see a horrifying photo of a cheeto working out 🤮. It was like seeing a pig sweating profusely 😳🖐. If I could rate it zero stars I would 💅. Not only that the app spreads false and or misleading  information. 🚫 I wouldn’t recommend 🤢. Please save your eyes from the horrifying images you may see ✨🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: Orange man bad
attributes.review: I wanted to go and download this app for the longest time to see if our orange man would not be so biased. Turns out an app based on orange man makes app biased and news. It doesn’t even make any sense. Like it’s the same old boring news that the right wing uses like it holds no value because it’s all fake biased news.

attributes.title: made my phone hot
attributes.review: this app is a mess. as soon as i opened it my phone started burning up, just casually. i had to set it down. my phone was taken over by the donald trump administration and they tried to hack my phone through this app. this app MUST be deleted expeditiously, it’s a waste of storage and a violation!

attributes.title: This app is a waste of time and space
attributes.review: I had this app for .5 seconds and it made me sick. This man is a sexist homophobic racist, and white supremacists. He makes me sick and everyone else should be sick at looking at his ugly face. This app is horrible and should be deleted. Donald Trump overall is a waste of space and oxygen and supporting his app is disgusting!!!!

attributes.title: Don’t get this app
attributes.review: A few days after I got this app whenever I tried to open it it constantly would kick me out and start to glitch constantly. I had to delete it because it wasn’t working. Don’t recommend this app to anyone is really bad.

attributes.title: This app scammed me
attributes.review: So I downloaded this to support our orange, and I was exited cause he kinda cute tho, I was hoping he was gonna call or something cause I game him my phone number! He didn’t! I tried to find how to text him but i couldn't so I dm’d him on insta and he Called me ugly! 😡Whatever you do just don’t download this app!

attributes.title: Review
attributes.review: This app keeps crashing my phone and using up all my data. i have had it for 3 days and by today my phone won’t stay charged for longer then 30 minutes. I talked to some coworkers about it and they say the same thing.

attributes.title: Hey tiktok how ya doin?🥰✌🏼
attributes.review: 🧚✨𝓣𝓱𝓲𝓼 𝓲𝓼 𝓽𝓱𝓮 𝔀𝓸𝓻𝓼𝓽 𝓪𝓹𝓹 𝓮𝓿𝓮𝓻🧚✨  way to long to download and the the dude with the bright orange face is getting rid of my pride and joy ✨𝐓𝐢𝐤𝐓𝐨𝐤✨ also the app looks💫DiSgUsTiNg💫 and it’s also asking for my personal information like you don’t need to all up in ma biscuits🌚 and this is why I have ✨ 𝓣𝓻𝓾𝓼𝓽 𝓲𝓼𝓼𝓾𝓮𝓼✨ but overall I do not remember this app😗✌🏼
